segments.text: I notice the steady stream of water filling the sink, and I wonder when someone will actually notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s focus on that plate is almost admirable, yet so misplaced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she ignore the sound of the overflow? It’s almost deafening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool, reaching precariously for cookies, makes me feel nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the girl is just standing there, arms raised, clearly encouraging his antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a ticking time bomb, ready to explode at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Despite the chaos, the sunlight creates such a warm and inviting atmosphere outside.
segments.speaker: PAR
